DOC.brief_summary: Endotracheal Tube ( ETT ) still prefer laparoscopic surgery fear pulmonary aspiration inadequate ventilation . Laryngeal mask Supreme ( LM-S ) single use device presence drain tube allow separate gastrointestinal respiratory tract . We plan compare ventilation parameter gastric distension score LM-S v ETT laparoscopic gynecological surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Laryngeal Mask Airway Supreme Endotracheal Tube In Patients Undergoing Gynecological Laparoscopy Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , randomize double-blind study receive permission `` Dokuz Eylül University Medical Faculty Non-Interventional Research Ethics Committee '' obtain patient ' informed consent , 100 patient American society anesthesiologist ( ASA ) classification group I-II , 18-65 year , undergo elective laparoscopic gynecological surgery include . Patients divide : Group 1= > ETT ( Endo tracheal group ) ( 50 patient ) Group 2= > LM-S ( Laryngeal mask Supreme ) ( 50 patient ) Patients surgeon perform operation aware airway device use . The patient group determine block randomize method . Patients take surgical room give standard monitoring ( non-invasive blood pressure measurement , electrocardiogram , peripheral oxygen saturation measurement ) anesthesia induction . For preoperative sedation 0.02 mg/kg midazolam IV administer . Patients preoxygenated 6 L/min oxygen 3 minute face mask . For anesthesia induction 2 minute 0.2 µg/kg/min remifentanil 6 mg/kg/hr propofol infusion , IV 1-2 mg/kg propofol , 0,5 mg/kg rocuronium bromide administer . After induction patient ventilate 6 L/min 100 % oxygen face mask . Airway device insert two researcher 5 year experience . Anesthetic maintenance provide 50 % O2/air mixture 0.1-0.4 µg/kg/min remifentanil 50-150 µg/kg/hr ( 3-9 mg/kg/hr ) propofol IV infusion ( 24 ) . Before LM-S insert , lubricate surface contact palate water-based K-YTM gel ( Johnson & Johnson Ltd. Maidenhead , UK ) without local anesthetic apply completely cover LM-S cuff . Depending patient 's body weight For < 50 kg , . 3 Between 50-70 kg , . 4 Between 70-100 kg , . 5 LM-S ( The Laryngeal Mask Company Limited , Singapore ) insert . After LM-S placement cuff inflate air pressure 60 water centimeter ( cmH20 ) ( cuff pressure manometer , Rusch , Germany ) . Two minute LM-S placement , insufflation , 10 minute insufflation trendelenburg position , desufflation LM-S removal , cuff pressure measure repeatedly record . At time interval ETT group , ETT cuff pressure measure . In ETT group woman . 7-7.5 tube use . The ETT cuff inflate leak sound cease . It measure manometer remain 20-30 water centimeter ( cmH20 ) . Successful placement LM-S ETT confirm square-shaped wave observe capnogram , easy ventilation respiration balloon visible chest movement . After successful placement airway device , cover prevent observation device use . The length time successful placement ( duration mouth open first successful ventilation ) , number try , ease placement record . Ease placement evaluate anesthetist charge airway easy , hard unsuccessful ( alternative airway management ) . In situation airway provision unsuccessful 3 try , patient without placement LM-S could intubate switched group airway management provide . For oropharyngeal leak test expiratory valve close air shut , O2 reduce 3 L/min first pressure value leak sound heard record oropharyngeal leak pressure . To prevent exposure lung barotrauma , peak inspiratory pressure reach 40 cmH2O expiratory valve open test conclude . This test repeat peritoneal insufflation , 10 minute later immediately desufflation complete researcher blind type airway device insert . Positive pressure respiration begin use ring system , 2-4 L/min fresh gas flow 0.5 fraction inspire oxygen ( FiO2 ) volume control 6-8 ml/kg tidal volume 10 respirations/min frequency . PEEP administer I : E ratio adjust 1:2 . ETCO2 hold 35-45 mmHg , necessary first respiration frequency increase tidal volume increase . Permission give CO2 insufflation laparoscopic intervention peritoneal interior pressure 15 mmHg . Two minute LM-S ETT placement , insufflation , 10 minute insufflation trendelenburg position , immediately peritoneal desufflation airway device removal , ventilation parameter evaluate . Respiratory measurement record : Tidal volume ( TV ) , respiration number ( RN ) , peripheral oxygen saturation ( SPO2 ) , end-tidal carbon dioxide pressure ( PETCO2 ) , peak airway pressure ( P peak ) , mean airway pressure ( P mean ) expiration volume per minute ( VE ) . Hemodynamic measurement record : ( simultaneous measurement additionally induction ) Systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) , diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) , mean blood pressure ( MBP ) heart rate ( HR ) . Evaluation relate gastric tube : Immediately airway device placement use either LM-S drainage tube intubate patient use 14 Ch orogastric probe within airway ( Bıcakcılar Tibbi Cihazlar Sanayi Ticaret A.Ş . Istanbul , Turkey ) , stomach reach gastric content aspirate . Ease placement amount fluid aspirate record . Ease placement classify person insert orogastric probe easy , easy , difficult difficult . Immediately intra-abdominal laparoscopic intervention immediately peritoneal insufflation end , gastric distension evaluate surgeon blind airway device use 0-10 ( 0=empty stomach , 10=distension obstruct surgical field ) difference score start end operation record . When patient cooperate LM-S ETT remove total anesthesia duration peritoneal insufflation duration record . Possible complication could develop airway device removal ( cough , vomit , laryngeal stridor , laryngeal spasm requirement airway intervention ) record . After LM-S removal presence blood evaluate 1. blood 2. trace amount blood 3. clear amount blood Revived patient take recovery unit blind researcher evaluate patient ' throat pain , hoarseness presence difficulty swallow 1st 24th hour . To evaluate throat pain VAS-10 ( visual analogue scale ) use .
DOC.criteria: ASA classification group III Between 1865 year Undergoing elective laparoscopic gynecological surgery Individuals neck upper respiratory pathology Individuals risk gastric content regurgitation/aspiration ( previous upper gastrointestinal surgery , know hiatus hernia , gastroesophageal reflux , history peptic ulcer , full stomach , pregnancy ) Individuals low pulmonary compliance high airway resistance ( chronic lung disease ) Obese patient ( BMI > 35 ) Individuals sore throat , dysphagia dysphonia Individuals possibility history difficult airway Operation time plan 4 hour
